head.title: at-rule-blacklist
head.description: at-rule-blacklist Specify a blacklist of disallowed at-rules. Options array|string: "\["array", "of", "unprefixed", "at-rules"]|"at-rule…

body:
#at-rule-blacklist

Specify a blacklist of disallowed at-rules.

    @keyframes name {}
/** ↑
 * At-rules like this */

#Options

array|string: "["array", "of", "unprefixed", "at-rules"]|"at-rule"

Given:

["extend", "keyframes"]

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a { @extend placeholder; }
@keyframes name {
  from { top: 10px; }
  to { top: 20px; }
}
@-moz-keyframes name {
  from { top: 10px; }
  to { top: 20px; }
}

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

@import "path/to/file.css";
